43  void setStaticContainers()

47  vector<vector<zVector>> edgePositions;
48 
49  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i ++)

89  void deactivate(int index, zHEData type)
90  {
91  // Vertex
92  if (type == zVertexData)
93  {
94  if (index > meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
95  if (!meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
96 
97  // remove from vertexPosition map
98  meshObj->mesh.removeFromPositionMap(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[index]);
99 
100  // null pointers indexed vertex
101  meshObj->mesh.vertices[index].removeVertex();
102 
103  // disable indexed vertex
104 
105  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[index] = false;
106 
107  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[index] = zVector(10000, 10000, 10000); // dummy position for VBO
108  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[index] = zVector(0, 0, 1); // dummy normal for VBO
109  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[index] = zColor(1, 1, 1, 1); // dummy color for VBO
110 
111 
112  // update numVertices
113  int newNumVertices = numVertices() - 1;
114  meshObj->mesh.setNumVertices(newNumVertices, false);
115  }
116 
117  // Edge
118  else if (type == zEdgeData)
119  {
120 
121  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
122  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
123 
124  int symEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getSym()->getEdgeId();
125 
126  // check if the vertex attached to the edge has the pointer to the current edge. If true update the pointer.
127  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getVertex()->getVertexId();
128  int v2 = meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getVertex()->getVertexId();
129 
130 
131  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[v1].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == symEdge)
132  {
133  vector<int> cEdgesV1;
134  getConnectedEdges(v1, zVertexData, cEdgesV1);
135 
136  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV1.size(); i++)
137  {
138  if (cEdgesV1[i] != symEdge) meshObj->mesh.vertices[v1].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV1[i]]);
139  }
140  }
141 
142  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[v2].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == index)
143  {
144  vector<int> cEdgesV2;
145  getConnectedEdges(v2, zVertexData, cEdgesV2);
146 
147  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV2.size(); i++)
148  {
149  if (cEdgesV2[i] != index) meshObj->mesh.vertices[v2].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV2[i]]);
150  }
151  }
152 
153  // check if the face attached to the edge has the pointer to the current edge. if true update pointer.
154 
155  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace())
156  {
157 
158  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->getEdge()->getEdgeId() == index)
159  {
160  vector<int> cEdgesV1;
161  getConnectedEdges(v1, zVertexData, cEdgesV1);
162 
163  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV1.size(); i++)
164  {
165  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV1[i]].getFace() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV1[i]]);
166  }
167 
168  }
169 
170  }
171 
172  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace())
173  {
174  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace()->getEdge()->getEdgeId() == symEdge)
175  {
176  vector<int> cEdgesV2;
177  getConnectedEdges(v2, zVertexData, cEdgesV2);
178 
179  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV2.size(); i++)
180  {
181  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV2[i]].getFace() == meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace()->setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV2[i]]);
182  }
183 
184  }
185 
186  }
187 
188  // remove edge from vertex edge map
189  meshObj->mesh.removeFromVerticesEdge(v1, v2);
190 
191  // make current edge pointer null
192  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].removeEdge();
193  meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].removeEdge();
194 
195  // deactivate edges
196  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index] = false;
197  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[symEdge] = false;
198 
199  // update numEdges
200  int newNumEdges = numEdges() - 2;
201  meshObj->mesh.setNumEdges(newNumEdges, false);
202  }
203 
204  // Face
205  else if (type == zFaceData)
206  {
207  if (index > meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
208  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
209 
210 
211  // make current face pointers null
212  meshObj->mesh.faces[index].removeFace();;
213 
214  // deactivate face
215  meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index] = false;
216 
217  // update numPolygons
218  int newNumFaces = numPolygons() - 1;
219  meshObj->mesh.setNumPolygons(newNumFaces, false);
220  }
221 
222  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
223 
224  }

231  void removeInactive(zHEData type = zVertexData)
232  {
233  // Vertex
234  if (type == zVertexData)
235  {
236 
237  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() != numVertices())
238  {
239  zVertex *resized = new zVertex[meshObj->mesh.max_n_v];
240 
241  int vertexActiveID = 0;
242  int numOrginalVertexActive = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
243 
244  for (int i = 0; i < numVertices(); i++)
245  {
246 
247  while (!meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
248  {
249  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.begin() + i);
250 
251  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.begin() + i);
252 
253  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors.begin() + i);
254 
255  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.begin() + i);
256 
257  vertexActiveID++;
258 
259  }
260 
261  resized[i].setVertexId(i);
262 
263 
264  // get connected edges and repoint their pointers
265  if (vertexActiveID < numOrginalVertexActive)
266  {
267  vector<int> cEdges;
268  getConnectedEdges(vertexActiveID, zVertexData, cEdges);
269 
270  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
271  {
272  meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[j]].getSym()->setVertex(&resized[i]);
273  }
274 
275 
276  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexActiveID].getEdge())
277  {
278  resized[i].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexActiveID].getEdge()->getEdgeId()]);
279 
280  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexActiveID].getEdge()->getEdgeId()].getSym()->setVertex(&resized[i]);
281  }
282  }
283 
284 
285  vertexActiveID++;
286 
287  }
288 
289  //printf("\n m: %i %i ", numVertices(), vertexActive.size());
290 
291 
292  delete[] meshObj->mesh.vertices;
293 
294  meshObj->mesh.vertices = resized;
295 
296  //printf("\n removed inactive vertices. ");
297  }
298 
299  }
300 
301  // Edge
302  else if (type == zEdgeData)
303  {
304  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() != numEdges())
305  {
306  zEdge *resized = new zEdge[meshObj->mesh.max_n_e];
307 
308  int edgeActiveID = 0;
309  int numOrginalEdgeActive = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
310 
311  int inactiveCounter = 0;
312 
313  // clear vertices edge map
314  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.clear();
315 
316 
317  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i += 2)
318  {
319 
320  while (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
321  {
322  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.erase(meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.begin() + i);
323 
324  meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.erase(meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.begin() + i);
325 
326  edgeActiveID++;
327 
328  }
329 
330 
331  resized[i].setEdgeId(i);
332  resized[i + 1].setEdgeId(i + 1);
333 
334  // get connected edges and repoint their pointers
335  if (edgeActiveID < numOrginalEdgeActive)
336  {
337 
338 
339  resized[i].setSym(&resized[i + 1]);
340 
341  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getNext())
342  {
343  resized[i].setNext(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getNext()->getEdgeId()]);
344 
345  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getNext()->setPrev(&resized[i]);
346  }
347  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getPrev())
348  {
349  resized[i].setPrev(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getPrev()->getEdgeId()]);
350 
351  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getPrev()->setNext(&resized[i]);
352  }
353 
354 
355  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getVertex())
356  {
357  resized[i].setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getVertex()->getVertexId()]);
358 
359  meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getVertex()->getVertexId()].setEdge(resized[i].getSym());
360  }
361 
362  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getFace())
363  {
364  resized[i].setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getFace()->getFaceId()]);
365  meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getFace()->getFaceId()].setEdge(&resized[i]);
366  }
367 
368 
369 
370  //sym edge
371  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getNext())
372  {
373  resized[i + 1].setNext(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getNext()->getEdgeId()]);
374 
375  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getNext()->setPrev(&resized[i + 1]);
376 
377  }
378  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getPrev())
379  {
380  resized[i + 1].setPrev(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getPrev()->getEdgeId()]);
381 
382  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getPrev()->setNext(&resized[i + 1]);
383  }
384 
385  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getVertex())
386  {
387  resized[i + 1].setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId()]);
388  meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId()].setEdge(resized[i + 1].getSym());
389  }
390 
391  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getFace())
392  {
393  resized[i + 1].setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getFace()->getFaceId()]);

395  }
396

399  int v2 = resized[i].getVertex()->getVertexId();
400  int v1 = resized[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId();

403 
404  }
405 
406  edgeActiveID += 2;
407 
408  }
409 
410  //printf("\n m: %i %i ", numEdges(), edgeActive.size());
411 
412  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
413  {
414  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()) meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].setEdge(&resized[meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId()]);
415  }
416 
417  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
418  {
419  if (meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()) meshObj->mesh.faces[i].setEdge(&resized[meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId()]);
420 
421  }
422

424  meshObj->mesh.edges = resized;
425 
426  //printf("\n removed inactive edges. ");
427  }

431  }
432 
433  // Mesh Face
434  else if (type == zFaceData)
435  {
436  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() != numPolygons())
437  {
438  zFace *resized = new zFace[meshObj->mesh.max_n_f];
439

444  {

506  void toOBJ(string outfilename)
507  {
508 
509  // remove inactive elements
510  if (numVertices() != meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
511  if (numEdges() != meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
512  if (numPolygons() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
513 
514  // output file
515  ofstream myfile;
516  myfile.open(outfilename.c_str());
517 
518  if (myfile.fail())
519  {
520  cout << " error in opening file " << outfilename.c_str() << endl;
521  return;
522 
523  }
524 
525 
526 
527  // vertex positions
528  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
529  {
530  myfile << "\n v " << meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].x << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].y << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].z;
531 
532  }
533 
534  // vertex nornmals
535  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.size(); i++)
536  {
537  myfile << "\n vn " << meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].x << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].y << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].z;
538 
539  }
540 
541  myfile << "\n";
542 
543  // face connectivity
544  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
545  {
546  vector<int> fVerts;
547  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
548 
549  myfile << "\n f ";
550 
551  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
552  {
553  myfile << fVerts[j] + 1;
554 
555  if (j != fVerts.size() - 1) myfile << " ";
556  }
557 
558  }
559 
560 
561 
562 
563  myfile.close();
564 
565  cout << endl << " OBJ exported. File: " << outfilename.c_str() << endl;
566 
567  }

574  void toJSON(string outfilename)
575  {
576 
577  // remove inactive elements
578  if (numVertices() != meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
579  if (numEdges() != meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
580  if (numPolygons() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size())removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
581 
582  // CREATE JSON FILE
583  zUtilsJsonHE meshJSON;
584  json j;
585 
586  // Vertices
587  for (int i = 0; i < numVertices(); i++)
588  {
589  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()) meshJSON.vertices.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId());
590  else meshJSON.vertices.push_back(-1);
591 
592  }
593 
594  //Edges
595  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i++)
596  {
597  vector<int> HE_edges;
598 
599  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getPrev()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getPrev()->getEdgeId());
600  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
601 
602  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getNext()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getNext()->getEdgeId());
603  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
604 
605  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId());
606  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
607 
608  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getFace()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getFace()->getFaceId());
609  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
610 
611  meshJSON.halfedges.push_back(HE_edges);
612  }
613 
614  // Faces
615  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
616  {
617  if (meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()) meshJSON.faces.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId());
618  else meshJSON.faces.push_back(-1);
619  }
620 
621  // vertex Attributes
622  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
623  {
624  vector<double> v_attrib;
625 
626  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].x);
627  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].y);
628  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].z);
629 
630  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].x);
631  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].y);
632  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].z);
633 
634 
635  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i].r);
636  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i].g);
637  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i].b);
638 
639 
640  meshJSON.vertexAttributes.push_back(v_attrib);
641  }
642 
643  // face Attributes
644  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
645  {
646  vector<double> f_attrib;
647 
648  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[i].x);
649  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[i].y);
650  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[i].z);
651 
652  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i].r);
653  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i].g);
654  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i].b);
655 
656  meshJSON.faceAttributes.push_back(f_attrib);
657  }
658 
659 
660 
661  // Json file
662  j["Vertices"] = meshJSON.vertices;
663  j["Halfedges"] = meshJSON.halfedges;
664  j["Faces"] = meshJSON.faces;
665  j["VertexAttributes"] = meshJSON.vertexAttributes;
666  j["HalfedgeAttributes"] = meshJSON.halfedgeAttributes;
667  j["FaceAttributes"] = meshJSON.faceAttributes;
668 
669  // EXPORT
670 
671  ofstream myfile;
672  myfile.open(outfilename.c_str());
673 
674  if (myfile.fail())
675  {
676  cout << " error in opening file " << outfilename.c_str() << endl;
677  return;
678  }
679 
680  //myfile.precision(16);
681  myfile << j.dump();
682  myfile.close();
683 
684  }

691  void fromOBJ(string infilename)
692  {
693  vector<zVector>positions;
694  vector<int>polyConnects;
695  vector<int>polyCounts;
696 
697  vector<zVector> vertexNormals;
698  vector<zVector> faceNormals;
699 
700  ifstream myfile;
701  myfile.open(infilename.c_str());
702 
703  if (myfile.fail())
704  {
705  cout << " error in opening file " << infilename.c_str() << endl;
706  return;
707 
708  }
709 
710  while (!myfile.eof())
711  {
712  string str;
713  getline(myfile, str);
714 
715  vector<string> perlineData = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.splitString(str, " ");
716 
717  if (perlineData.size() > 0)
718  {
719  // vertex
720  if (perlineData[0] == "v")
721  {
722  if (perlineData.size() == 4)
723  {
724  zVector pos;
725  pos.x = atof(perlineData[1].c_str());
726  pos.y = atof(perlineData[2].c_str());
727  pos.z = atof(perlineData[3].c_str());
728 
729  positions.push_back(pos);
730  }
731  //printf("\n working vertex");
732  }
733 
734  // vertex normal
735  if (perlineData[0] == "vn")
736  {
737  //printf("\n working vertex normal ");
738  if (perlineData.size() == 4)
739  {
740  zVector norm;
741  norm.x = atof(perlineData[1].c_str());
742  norm.y = atof(perlineData[2].c_str());
743  norm.z = atof(perlineData[3].c_str());
744 
745  vertexNormals.push_back(norm);
746  }
747  //printf("\n working vertex");
748  }
749 
750  // face
751  if (perlineData[0] == "f")
752  {
753 
754  zVector norm;
755 
756 
757 
758  for (int i = 1; i < perlineData.size(); i++)
759  {
760  vector<string> faceData = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.splitString(perlineData[i], "/");
761 
762  //vector<string> cleanFaceData = splitString(faceData[0], "/\/");
763 
764  int id = atoi(faceData[0].c_str()) - 1;
765  polyConnects.push_back(id);
766 
767  //printf(" %i ", id);
768 
769  int normId = atoi(faceData[faceData.size() - 1].c_str()) - 1;
770  norm += vertexNormals[normId];
771 
772  }
773 
774  norm /= (perlineData.size() - 1);
775  norm.normalize();
776  faceNormals.push_back(norm);
777 
778  polyCounts.push_back(perlineData.size() - 1);
779  //printf("\n working face ");
780  }
781  }
782  }
783 
784  myfile.close();
785 
786 
787  meshObj->mesh = zMesh(positions, polyCounts, polyConnects);;
788  printf("\n mesh: %i %i %i", numVertices(), numEdges(), numPolygons());
789 
790 
791  setFaceNormals(faceNormals);
792 
793  }
794 
800  void fromJSON(string infilename)
801  {
802  json j;
803  zUtilsJsonHE meshJSON;
804 
805 
806  ifstream in_myfile;
807  in_myfile.open(infilename.c_str());
808 
809  int lineCnt = 0;
810 
811  if (in_myfile.fail())
812  {
813  cout << " error in opening file " << infilename.c_str() << endl;
814  return;
815  }
816 
817  in_myfile >> j;
818  in_myfile.close();
819 
820  // READ Data from JSON
821 
822  // Vertices
823  meshJSON.vertices.clear();
824  meshJSON.vertices = (j["Vertices"].get<vector<int>>());
825 
826  //Edges
827  meshJSON.halfedges.clear();
828  meshJSON.halfedges = (j["Halfedges"].get<vector<vector<int>>>());
829 
830  // Faces
831  meshJSON.faces.clear();
832  meshJSON.faces = (j["Faces"].get<vector<int>>());
833 
834 
835  // update mesh
836 
837  meshObj->mesh.vertices = new zVertex[meshJSON.vertices.size() * 2];
838  meshObj->mesh.edges = new zEdge[meshJSON.halfedges.size() * 2];
839  meshObj->mesh.faces = new zFace[meshJSON.faces.size() * 2];
840 
841  meshObj->mesh.setNumVertices(meshJSON.vertices.size());
842  meshObj->mesh.setNumEdges(floor(meshJSON.halfedges.size()));
843  meshObj->mesh.setNumPolygons(meshJSON.faces.size());
844 
845  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.clear();
846  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.vertices.size(); i++)
847  {
848  meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].setVertexId(i);
849  if (meshJSON.vertices[i] != -1) meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.vertices[i]]);
850 
851  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.push_back(true);
852  }
853 
854  int k = 0;
855  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.clear();
856  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.halfedges.size(); i++)
857  {
858  meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setEdgeId(i);
859 
860  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setPrev(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k]]);
861  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 1] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setNext(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 1]]);
862  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 2] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 2]]);
863  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 3] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 3]]);
864 
865 
866  if (i % 2 == 0) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setSym(&meshObj->mesh.edges[i]);
867  else meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setSym(&meshObj->mesh.edges[i - 1]);
868 
869  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.push_back(true);
870  }
871 
872  meshObj->mesh.faceActive.clear();
873  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.faces.size(); i++)
874  {
875  meshObj->mesh.faces[i].setFaceId(i);
876  if (meshJSON.faces[i] != -1) meshObj->mesh.faces[i].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.faces[i]]);
877 
878  meshObj->mesh.faceActive.push_back(true);
879  }
880 
881  // Vertex Attributes
882  meshJSON.vertexAttributes = j["VertexAttributes"].get<vector<vector<double>>>();
883  //printf("\n vertexAttributes: %zi %zi", vertexAttributes.size(), vertexAttributes[0].size());
884 
885  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.clear();
886  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.vertexAttributes.size(); i++)
887  {
888  for (int k = 0; k < meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i].size(); k++)
889  {
890 
891  // position and color
892 
893  if (meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i].size() == 9)
894  {
895  zVector pos(meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 1], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 2]);
896  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.push_back(pos);
897 
898  zVector normal(meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 3], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 4], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 5]);
899  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.push_back(pos);
900 
901  zColor col(meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 6], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 7], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 8], 1);
902  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors.push_back(col);
903 
904  k += 8;
905  }
906  }
907  }
908 
909 
910  // Edge Attributes
911  meshJSON.halfedgeAttributes = j["HalfedgeAttributes"].get<vector<vector<double>>>();
912 
913 
914  // face Attributes
915  meshJSON.faceAttributes = j["FaceAttributes"].get<vector<vector<double>>>();
916 
917  meshObj->mesh.faceColors.clear();
918  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.clear();
919  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.faceAttributes.size(); i++)
920  {
921  for (int k = 0; k < meshJSON.faceAttributes[i].size(); k++)
922  {
923  // position
924  if (meshJSON.faceAttributes[i].size() == 6)
925  {
926  zColor col(meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 3], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 4], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 5], 1);
927  meshObj->mesh.faceColors.push_back(col);
928 
929 
930  zVector normal(meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 1], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 2]);
931  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.push_back(normal);
932 
933  k += 5;
934  }
935  }
936 
937  }
938 
939 
940  // add to maps
941  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
942  {
943  meshObj->mesh.addToPositionMap(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i], i);
944  }
945 
946 
947  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i += 2)
948  {
949  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId();
950  int v2 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId();
951 
952  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(v1, v2, i);
953  }
954 
955  }

1132  bool vertexExists(zVector pos, int &outVertexId)
1133  {
1134  bool out = false;;
1135 
1136  double factor = pow(10, 3);
1137  double x = round(pos.x *factor) / factor;
1138  double y = round(pos.y *factor) / factor;
1139  double z = round(pos.z *factor) / factor;
1140 
1141  string hashKey = (to_string(x) + "," + to_string(y) + "," + to_string(z));
1142  std::unordered_map<std::string, int>::const_iterator got = meshObj->mesh.positionVertex.find(hashKey);
1143 
1144 
1145  if (got != meshObj->mesh.positionVertex.end())
1146  {
1147  out = true;
1148  outVertexId = got->second;
1149  }
1150 
1151 
1152  return out;
1153  }
1154 
1163  bool edgeExists(int v1, int v2, int &outEdgeId)
1164  {
1165 
1166  bool out = false;
1167 
1168  string hashKey = (to_string(v1) + "," + to_string(v2));
1169  std::unordered_map<std::string, int>::const_iterator got = meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.find(hashKey);
1170 
1171 
1172  if (got != meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.end())
1173  {
1174  out = true;
1175  outEdgeId = got->second;
1176  }
1177 
1178  return out;
1179  }

1188  void getEdges(int index, zHEData type, vector<int> &edgeIndicies)
1189  {
1190 
1191  edgeIndicies.clear();
1192 
1193  // Face
1194  if (type == zFaceData)
1195  {
1196  if (meshObj->mesh.faces[index].getEdge())
1197  {
1198  zEdge* start = meshObj->mesh.faces[index].getEdge();
1199  zEdge* e = start;
1200 
1201  bool exit = false;
1202 
1203  do
1204  {
1205  edgeIndicies.push_back(e->getEdgeId());
1206  if (e->getNext())e = e->getNext();
1207  else exit = true;
1208 
1209  } while (e != start && !exit);
1210  }
1211  }
1212 
1213  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1214 
1215 
1216  }

1309  void getConnectedEdges(int index, zHEData type, vector<int>& edgeIndicies)
1310  {
1311  edgeIndicies.clear();
1312 
1313  // Vertex
1314  if (type == zVertexData)
1315  {
1316  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[index].getEdge())
1317  {
1318  zEdge* start = meshObj->mesh.vertices[index].getEdge();
1319  zEdge* e = start;
1320 
1321  bool exit = false;
1322 
1323  do
1324  {
1325  edgeIndicies.push_back(e->getEdgeId());
1326 
1327  //printf("\n %i %i ", e->getEdgeId(), start->getEdgeId());
1328 
1329  if (e->getPrev())
1330  {
1331  if (e->getPrev()->getSym()) e = e->getPrev()->getSym();
1332  else exit = true;
1333  }
1334  else exit = true;
1335 
1336  } while (e != start && !exit);
1337  }
1338  }
1339 
1340  // Edge
1341  else if (type == zEdgeData)
1342  {
1343  vector<int> connectedEdgestoVert0;
1344  getConnectedEdges(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getVertex()->getVertexId(), zVertexData, connectedEdgestoVert0);
1345 
1346  vector<int> connectedEdgestoVert1;
1347  getConnectedEdges(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId(), zVertexData, connectedEdgestoVert1);
1348 
1349  for (int i = 0; i < connectedEdgestoVert0.size(); i++)
1350  {
1351  if (connectedEdgestoVert0[i] != index) edgeIndicies.push_back(connectedEdgestoVert0[i]);
1352  }
1353 
1354 
1355  for (int i = 0; i < connectedEdgestoVert1.size(); i++)
1356  {
1357  if (connectedEdgestoVert1[i] != index) edgeIndicies.push_back(connectedEdgestoVert1[i]);
1358  }
1359  }
1360 
1361  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1362 
1363 
1364  }

1479  bool onBoundary(int index, zHEData type = zVertexData)
1480  {
1481  bool out = false;
1482 
1483  // zMesh Vertex
1484  if (type == zVertexData && index != -1)
1485  {
1486 
1487  vector<int> connectedEdges;
1488  getConnectedEdges(index, type, connectedEdges);
1489 
1490  for (int i = 0; i < connectedEdges.size(); i++)
1491  {
1492  if (onBoundary(connectedEdges[i], zEdgeData))
1493  {
1494  out = true;
1495  break;
1496  }
1497  }
1498  }
1499 
1500  // Mesh Edge
1501  else if (type == zEdgeData && index != -1)
1502  {
1503  if (!meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()) out = true;
1504  //else printf("\n face: %i", edges[index].getFace()->getFaceId());
1505  }
1506 
1507  // Mesh Face
1508  else if (type == zFaceData && index != -1)
1509  {
1510  vector<int> fEdges;
1511  getEdges(index, zFaceData, fEdges);
1512 
1513  for (int i = 0; i < fEdges.size(); i++)
1514  {
1515  if (onBoundary(fEdges[i], zEdgeData))
1516  {
1517  out = true;
1518  break;
1519  }
1520  }
1521  }
1522 
1523  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1524 
1525  return out;
1526  }

1816  void computeEdgeColorfromVertexColor()
1817  {
1818 
1819  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size(); i += 2)
1820  {
1821  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
1822  {
1823  int v0 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId();
1824  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId();
1825 
1826  zColor col;
1827  col.r = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].r + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].r) * 0.5;
1828  col.g = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].g + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].g) * 0.5;
1829  col.b = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].b + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].b) * 0.5;
1830  col.a = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].a + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].a) * 0.5;
1831 
1832  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.size() <= i) meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.push_back(col);
1833  else meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[i] = col;
1834 
1835  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.size() <= i + 1) meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.push_back(col);
1836  else meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[i + 1] = col;
1837  }
1838 
1839 
1840  }
1841 
1842 
1843 
1844  }

1850  void computeVertexColorfromEdgeColor()
1851  {
1852  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1853  {
1854  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1855  {
1856  vector<int> cEdges;
1857  getConnectedEdges(i, zVertexData, cEdges);
1858 
1859  zColor col;
1860  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
1861  {
1862  col.r += meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[cEdges[j]].r;
1863  col.g += meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[cEdges[j]].g;
1864  col.b += meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[cEdges[j]].b;
1865  }
1866 
1867  col.r /= cEdges.size(); col.g /= cEdges.size(); col.b /= cEdges.size();
1868 
1869  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i] = col;
1870 
1871  }
1872  }
1873  }

1939  void smoothColors(int smoothVal = 1, zHEData type = zVertexData)
1940  {
1941  for (int j = 0; j < smoothVal; j++)
1942  {
1943  if (type == zVertexData)
1944  {
1945  vector<zColor> tempColors;
1946 
1947  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1948  {
1949  zColor col;
1950  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1951  {
1952  vector<int> cVerts;
1953  getConnectedVertices(i, zVertexData, cVerts);
1954 
1955  zColor currentCol = meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i];
1956 
1957 
1958  for (int j = 0; j < cVerts.size(); j++)
1959  {
1960  col.r += meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[cVerts[j]].r;
1961  col.g += meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[cVerts[j]].g;
1962  col.b += meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[cVerts[j]].b;
1963  }
1964 
1965  col.r += (currentCol.r); col.g += (currentCol.g); col.b += (currentCol.b);
1966 
1967  col.r /= cVerts.size(); col.g /= cVerts.size(); col.b /= cVerts.size();
1968 
1969 
1970  }
1971 
1972  tempColors.push_back(col);
1973 
1974  }
1975 
1976  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1977  {
1978  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1979  {
1980  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i] = (tempColors[i]);
1981  }
1982  }
1983  }
1984 
1985 
1986  if (type == zFaceData)
1987  {
1988  vector<zColor> tempColors;
1989 
1990  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
1991  {
1992  zColor col;
1993  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
1994  {
1995  vector<int> cFaces;
1996  getConnectedFaces(i, zFaceData, cFaces);
1997 
1998  zColor currentCol = meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i];
1999  for (int j = 0; j < cFaces.size(); j++)
2000  {
2001  col.r += meshObj->mesh.faceColors[cFaces[j]].r;
2002  col.g += meshObj->mesh.faceColors[cFaces[j]].g;
2003  col.b += meshObj->mesh.faceColors[cFaces[j]].b;
2004  }
2005 
2006  col.r += (currentCol.r); col.g += (currentCol.g); col.b += (currentCol.b);
2007 
2008  col.r /= cFaces.size(); col.g /= cFaces.size(); col.b /= cFaces.size();
2009 
2010  }
2011 
2012  tempColors.push_back(col);
2013 
2014  }
2015 
2016  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
2017  {
2018  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
2019  {
2020  meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i] = (tempColors[i]);
2021  }
2022  }
2023  }
2024 
2025  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
2026  }
2027 
2028 
2029 
2030  }

2036  void computeVertexNormalfromFaceNormal()
2037  {
2038 
2039  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.clear();
2040 
2041  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
2042  {
2043  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
2044  {
2045  vector<int> cFaces;
2046  getConnectedFaces(i, zVertexData, cFaces);
2047 
2048  zVector norm;
2049 
2050  for (int j = 0; j < cFaces.size(); j++)
2051  {
2052  norm += meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[cFaces[j]];
2053  }
2054 
2055  norm /= cFaces.size();
2056  norm.normalize();
2057  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.push_back(norm);
2058  }
2059  else meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.push_back(zVector());
2060  }
2061 
2062  }
2063 
2068  void computeMeshNormals()
2069  {
2070  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.clear();
2071 
2072  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
2073  {
2074  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
2075  {
2076  // get face vertices and correspondiing positions
2077 
2078  //printf("\n f %i :", i);
2079  vector<int> fVerts;
2080  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
2081 
2082  zVector fCen; // face center
2083 
2084  vector<zVector> points;
2085  for (int i = 0; i < fVerts.size(); i++)
2086  {
2087  //printf(" %i ", fVerts[i]);
2088  points.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[i]]);
2089 
2090  fCen += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[i]];
2091  }
2092 
2093  fCen /= fVerts.size();
2094 
2095  zVector fNorm; // face normal
2096 
2097  if (fVerts.size() != 3)
2098  {
2099  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
2100  {
2101  fNorm += (points[j] - fCen) ^ (points[(j + 1) % fVerts.size()] - fCen);
2102 
2103 
2104  }
2105 
2106  }
2107  else
2108  {
2109  zVector cross = (points[1] - points[0]) ^ (points[fVerts.size() - 1] - points[0]);
2110  cross.normalize();
2111 
2112  fNorm = cross;
2113 
2114  //printf("\n working! %i ", i);
2115 
2116  }
2117 
2118 
2119  fNorm.normalize();
2120  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.push_back(fNorm);
2121  }
2122  else meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.push_back(zVector());
2123 
2124  }
2125 
2126 
2127  // compute vertex normal
2128  computeVertexNormalfromFaceNormal();
2129  }

2137  void averageVertices(int numSteps = 1)
2138  {
2139  for (int k = 0; k < numSteps; k++)
2140  {
2141  vector<zVector> tempVertPos;
2142 
2143  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
2144  {
2145  tempVertPos.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i]);
2146 
2147  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
2148  {
2149  if (!checkVertexValency(i, 1))
2150  {
2151  vector<int> cVerts;
2152 
2153  getConnectedVertices(i, zVertexData, cVerts);
2154 
2155  for (int j = 0; j < cVerts.size(); j++)
2156  {
2157  zVector p = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[cVerts[j]];
2158  tempVertPos[i] += p;
2159  }
2160 
2161  tempVertPos[i] /= (cVerts.size() + 1);
2162  }
2163  }
2164 
2165  }
2166 
2167  // update position
2168  for (int i = 0; i < tempVertPos.size(); i++) meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] = tempVertPos[i];
2169  }
2170 
2171  }

2857  zVector getCenter( int index, zHEData type)
2858  {
2859  // Mesh Edge
2860  if (type == zEdgeData)
2861  {
2862  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
2863  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
2864 
2865  vector<int> eVerts;
2866  getVertices(index, zEdgeData, eVerts);
2867 
2868  return (meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[eVerts[0]] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[eVerts[1]]) * 0.5;
2869  }
2870 
2871  // Mesh Face
2872  else if (type == zFaceData)
2873  {
2874 
2875  if (index > meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
2876  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
2877 
2878  vector<int> fVerts;
2879  getVertices(index, zFaceData, fVerts);
2880  zVector cen;
2881 
2882  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++) cen += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
2883  cen /= fVerts.size();
2884 
2885  return cen;
2886 
2887  }
2888  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
2889  }
2890 
2896  zVector getCenter()
2897  {
2898  zVector out;
2899 
2900  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
2901  {
2902  out += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i];
2903  }
2904 
2905  out /= meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size();
2906 
2907  return out;
2908 
2909  }

2917  void getCenters(zHEData type, vector<zVector> &centers)
2918  {
2919  // Mesh Edge
2920  if (type == zEdgeData)
2921  {
2922  vector<zVector> edgeCenters;
2923 
2924  edgeCenters.clear();
2925 
2926  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size(); i += 2)
2927  {
2928  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
2929  {
2930  vector<int> eVerts;
2931  getVertices(i, zEdgeData, eVerts);
2932 
2933  zVector cen = (meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[eVerts[0]] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[eVerts[1]]) * 0.5;
2934 
2935  edgeCenters.push_back(cen);
2936  edgeCenters.push_back(cen);
2937  }
2938  else
2939  {
2940  edgeCenters.push_back(zVector());
2941  edgeCenters.push_back(zVector());
2942  }
2943  }
2944 
2945  centers = edgeCenters;
2946  }
2947 
2948  // Mesh Face
2949  else if (type == zFaceData)
2950  {
2951  vector<zVector> faceCenters;
2952  faceCenters.clear();
2953 
2954  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
2955  {
2956  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
2957  {
2958  vector<int> fVerts;
2959  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
2960  zVector cen;
2961 
2962  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++) cen += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
2963 
2964  cen /= fVerts.size();
2965  faceCenters.push_back(cen);
2966  }
2967  else
2968  {
2969  faceCenters.push_back(zVector());
2970  }
2971  }
2972 
2973  centers = faceCenters;
2974  }
2975  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
2976  }

3644  void getPrincipalCurvature(vector<zCurvature> &vertexCurvatures)
3645  {
3646  for (int j = 0; j < numVertices(); j++)
3647  {
3648 
3649  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[j])
3650  {
3651  double angleSum = 0;
3652  double cotangentSum = 0;
3653  double areaSum = 0;
3654  double areaSumMixed = 0;
3655  double edgeLengthSquare = 0;
3656  float gaussianCurv = 0;
3657  float gaussianAngle = 0;
3658 
3659  zCurvature curv;
3660  curv.k1 = 0;
3661  curv.k2 = 0;
3662 
3663  zVector meanCurvNormal;
3664 
3665  if (!onBoundary(j, zVertexData))
3666  {
3667  vector<int> connectedvertices;
3668  getConnectedVertices(j, zVertexData, connectedvertices);
3669 
3670  zVector pt = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[j];
3671 
3672  float multFactor = 0.125;
3673  for (int i = 0; i < connectedvertices.size(); i++)
3674  {
3675  int next = (i + 1) % connectedvertices.size();
3676  int prev = (i + connectedvertices.size() - 1) % connectedvertices.size();
3677 
3678  zVector pt1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[connectedvertices[i]];
3679  zVector pt2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[connectedvertices[next]];
3680  zVector pt3 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[connectedvertices[prev]];
3681 
3682  zVector p01 = pt - pt1;
3683  zVector p02 = pt - pt2;
3684  zVector p10 = pt1 - pt;
3685  zVector p20 = pt2 - pt;
3686  zVector p12 = pt1 - pt2;
3687  zVector p21 = pt2 - pt1;
3688  zVector p31 = pt3 - pt1;
3689 
3690  zVector cr = (p10) ^ (p20);
3691 
3692  float ang = (p10).angle(p20);
3693  angleSum += ang;
3694  cotangentSum += (((p20)*(p10)) / cr.length());
3695 
3696 
3697  float e_Length = (pt1 - pt2).length();
3698 
3699  edgeLengthSquare += (e_Length * e_Length);
3700 
3701  zVector cr_alpha = (p01) ^ (p21);
3702  zVector cr_beta = (p01) ^ (p31);
3703 
3704  float coTan_alpha = (((p01)*(p21)) / cr_alpha.length());
3705  float coTan_beta = (((p01)*(p31)) / cr_beta.length());
3706 
3707  // check if triangle is obtuse
3708  if ((p10).angle(p20) <= 90 && (p01).angle(p21) <= 90 && (p12).angle(p02) <= 90)
3709  {
3710  areaSumMixed += (coTan_alpha + coTan_beta) * edgeLengthSquare * 0.125;
3711  }
3712  else
3713  {
3714 
3715  double triArea = (((p10) ^ (p20)).length()) / 2;
3716 
3717  if ((ang) <= 90) areaSumMixed += triArea * 0.25;
3718  else areaSumMixed += triArea * 0.5;
3719 
3720  }
3721 
3722  meanCurvNormal += ((pt - pt1)*(coTan_alpha + coTan_beta));
3723  }
3724 
3725  meanCurvNormal /= (2 * areaSumMixed);
3726 
3727  gaussianCurv = (360 - angleSum) / ((0.5 * areaSum) - (multFactor * cotangentSum * edgeLengthSquare));
3728  //outGauss.push_back(gaussianCurv);
3729 
3731 
3732  //gaussianCurv = (360 - angleSum) / areaSumMixed;
3733 
3734  double meanCurv = (meanCurvNormal.length() / 2);
3735  //if (meanCurv <0.001) meanCurv = 0;
3736 
3737  double deltaX = (meanCurv*meanCurv) - gaussianCurv;
3738  if (deltaX < 0) deltaX = 0;
3739 
3740 
3741  curv.k1 = meanCurv + sqrt(deltaX);
3742  curv.k2 = meanCurv - sqrt(deltaX);
3743 
3744  }
3745 
3746  vertexCurvatures.push_back(curv);
3747  }
3748 
3749  else
3750  {
3751  zCurvature curv;
3752 
3753  curv.k1 = -1;
3754  curv.k2 = -1;
3755 
3756  vertexCurvatures.push_back(curv);
3757  }
3758  }
3759  }

4067  polyCounts.clear();
4068 
4069  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
4070  {
4071  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i]) continue;
4072 
4073  vector<int> facevertices;
4074  getVertices(i, zFaceData, facevertices);
4075 
4076  polyCounts.push_back(facevertices.size());
4077 
4078  for (int j = 0; j < facevertices.size(); j++)
4079  {
4080  polyConnects.push_back(facevertices[j]);
4081  }
4082  }
4083  }

4091  {

4095  {
4096  edgeConnects.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId());
4097  edgeConnects.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId());
4098  }

4138  void faceTriangulate(int faceIndex)
4139  {
4140 
4141  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() == 0 || meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size())computeMeshNormals();
4142 
4143  vector<int> fVerts;
4144  getVertices(faceIndex, zFaceData, fVerts);
4145 
4146  //printf("\n %i : nV %i ", i, fVerts.size());
4147 
4148  int numfaces_original = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
4149  int numEdges_original = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
4150 
4151  if (fVerts.size() != 3)
4152  {
4153  // compute polygon Triangles
4154  int n_Tris = 0;
4155  vector<int> Tri_connects;
4156  getFaceTriangles( faceIndex, n_Tris, Tri_connects);
4157 
4158  //printf("\n %i numtris: %i %i ",i, n_Tris, Tri_connects.size());
4159 
4160  for (int j = 0; j < n_Tris; j++)
4161  {
4162  vector<int> triVerts;
4163  triVerts.push_back(Tri_connects[j * 3]);
4164  triVerts.push_back(Tri_connects[j * 3 + 1]);
4165  triVerts.push_back(Tri_connects[j * 3 + 2]);
4166 
4167  //printf("\n %i %i %i ", Tri_connects[j * 3], Tri_connects[j * 3 + 1], Tri_connects[j * 3 + 2]);
4168 
4169  // check if edges e01, e12 or e20
4170  int e01_ID, e12_ID, e20_ID;
4171  bool e01_Boundary = false;
4172  bool e12_Boundary = false;
4173  bool e20_Boundary = false;
4174 
4175  for (int k = 0; k < triVerts.size(); k++)
4176  {
4177  int e;
4178  bool eExists = meshObj->mesh.edgeExists(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()], e);
4179 
4180 
4181  if (k == 0)
4182  {
4183 
4184  if (eExists)
4185  {
4186  e01_ID = e;
4187 
4188  if (e01_ID < numEdges_original)
4189  {
4190  if (onBoundary(e, zEdgeData))
4191  {
4192  e01_Boundary = true;
4193 
4194  }
4195  }
4196 
4197 
4198  }
4199  else
4200  {
4201  meshObj->mesh.addEdges(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()]);
4202  e01_ID = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2;
4203 
4204 
4205  }
4206  }
4207 
4208 
4209  if (k == 1)
4210  {
4211  if (eExists)
4212  {
4213  e12_ID = e;
4214 
4215  if (e12_ID < numEdges_original)
4216  {
4217  if (onBoundary(e, zEdgeData))
4218  {
4219  e12_Boundary = true;
4220  }
4221  }
4222 
4223  }
4224  else
4225  {
4226  meshObj->mesh.addEdges(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()]);
4227 
4228  e12_ID = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2;
4229  }
4230  }
4231 
4232 
4233 
4234  if (k == 2)
4235  {
4236  if (eExists)
4237  {
4238 
4239  e20_ID = e;
4240 
4241  if (e20_ID < numEdges_original)
4242  {
4243  if (onBoundary(e, zEdgeData))
4244  {
4245  e20_Boundary = true;
4246 
4247  }
4248  }
4249 
4250  }
4251  else
4252  {
4253  meshObj->mesh.addEdges(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()]);
4254  e20_ID = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2;
4255  }
4256 
4257  }
4258 
4259 
4260 
4261  }
4262 
4263  zEdge* e01 = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e01_ID];
4264  zEdge* e12 = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e12_ID];
4265  zEdge* e20 = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e20_ID];
4266 
4267  //printf("\n %i %i %i ", e01_ID, e12_ID, e20_ID);
4268 
4269 
4270  if (j > 0)
4271  {
4272  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon();
4273  meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1].setEdge(e01);
4274 
4275  if (!e01_Boundary) e01->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1]);
4276  if (!e12_Boundary) e12->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1]);
4277  if (!e20_Boundary) e20->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1]);
4278  }
4279  else
4280  {
4281  if (!e01_Boundary) meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex].setEdge(e01);
4282  else if (!e12_Boundary) meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex].setEdge(e12);
4283  else if (!e20_Boundary) meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex].setEdge(e20);
4284 
4285 
4286  if (!e01_Boundary) e01->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex]);
4287  if (!e12_Boundary) e12->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex]);
4288  if (!e20_Boundary) e20->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex]);
4289  }
4290 
4291  // update edge pointers
4292  e01->setNext(e12);
4293  e01->setPrev(e20);
4294  e12->setNext(e20);
4295 
4296  }
4297  }
4298 
4299  }

4305  void triangulate()
4306  {
4307 
4308  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() == 0 || meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) computeMeshNormals();
4309 
4310 
4311 
4312  // iterate through faces and triangulate faces with more than 3 vetices
4313  int numfaces_original = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
4314 
4315  int numEdges_original = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
4316  //printf("\n numfaces_before: %i ", numfaces_before);
4317 
4318  for (int i = 0; i < numfaces_original; i++)
4319  {
4320  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i]) continue;
4321 
4322  faceTriangulate(i);
4323 
4324  }
4325 
4326 
4327  computeMeshNormals();
4328 
4329  }

4334 
4341  void deleteVertex(int index, bool removeInactiveElems = true)
4342  {
4343  if (index > meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4344  if (!meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4345 
4346  // check if boundary vertex
4347  bool boundaryVertex = (onBoundary(index, zVertexData));
4348 
4349  // get connected faces
4350  vector<int> cFaces;
4351  getConnectedFaces(index, zVertexData, cFaces);
4352 
4353  // get connected edges
4354  vector<int> cEdges;
4355  getConnectedEdges(index, zVertexData, cEdges);
4356 
4357 
4358 
4359  // get vertices in cyclical orders without the the vertex to be removed. remove duplicates if any
4360  vector<int> outerVertices;
4361 
4362  vector<int> deactivateVertices;
4363  vector<int> deactivateEdges;
4364 
4365  deactivateVertices.push_back(index);
4366 
4367  // add to deactivate edges connected edges
4368  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++) deactivateEdges.push_back(cEdges[i]);
4369 
4370  // add to deactivate vertices with valence 2 and connected edges of that vertex
4371  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++)
4372  {
4373  int v0 = meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4374 
4375  if (!onBoundary(v0, zVertexData) && checkVertexValency(v0, 2))
4376  {
4377  deactivateVertices.push_back(v0);
4378  deactivateEdges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getNext()->getEdgeId());
4379  }
4380  }
4381 
4382  // compute new face vertices
4383  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++)
4384  {
4385  if (!meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getFace()) continue;
4386 
4387  zEdge *curEdge = &meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]];
4388  int v0 = curEdge->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4389 
4390  do
4391  {
4392  bool vertExists = false;
4393 
4394  for (int k = 0; k < outerVertices.size(); k++)
4395  {
4396  if (v0 == outerVertices[k])
4397  {
4398  vertExists = true;
4399  break;
4400  }
4401  }
4402 
4403  if (!vertExists)
4404  {
4405  for (int k = 0; k < deactivateVertices.size(); k++)
4406  {
4407  if (v0 == deactivateVertices[k])
4408  {
4409  vertExists = true;
4410  break;
4411  }
4412  }
4413  }
4414 
4415  if (!vertExists) outerVertices.push_back(v0);
4416 
4417 
4418 
4419  curEdge = curEdge->getNext();
4420  v0 = curEdge->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4421 
4422 
4423  } while (v0 != index);
4424 
4425  }
4426 
4427 
4428  // deactivate connected edges
4429  for (int i = 0; i < deactivateEdges.size(); i++)
4430  {
4431  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[deactivateEdges[i]])deactivateElement(deactivateEdges[i], zEdgeData);
4432  }
4433 
4434  // disable connected faces
4435  for (int i = 0; i < cFaces.size(); i++)
4436  {
4437  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[cFaces[i]]) deactivateElement(cFaces[i], zFaceData);
4438  }
4439 
4440  // deactivate vertex
4441  for (int i = 0; i < deactivateVertices.size(); i++)
4442  {
4443  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[deactivateVertices[i]]) deactivateElement(deactivateVertices[i], zVertexData);
4444  }
4445 
4446 
4447 
4448  // add new face if outerVertices has more than 2 vertices
4449 
4450  if (outerVertices.size() > 2)
4451  {
4452  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(outerVertices);
4453 
4454  if (boundaryVertex) meshObj->mesh.update_BoundaryEdgePointers();
4455  }
4456 
4457  computeMeshNormals();
4458 
4459  if (removeInactiveElems)
4460  {
4461  removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
4462  removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
4463  removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
4464  }
4465  }
4466 
4467 
4474  void deleteFace(int index, bool removeInactiveElems = true)
4475  {
4476  if (index > meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4477  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4478 
4479  // check if there is only 1 polygon. If true, cant perform collapse.
4480  if (numPolygons() == 1)
4481  {
4482  printf("\n Can't delete on single face mesh.");
4483  return;
4484  }
4485 
4486  // get faces vertices
4487  vector<int> fVerts;
4488  getVertices(index, zFaceData, fVerts);
4489 
4490 
4491 
4492  // get face edges.
4493  vector<int> fEdges;
4494  getEdges(index, zFaceData, fEdges);
4495 
4496  // connected edge for each face vertex
4497  vector<int> fVertsValence;
4498  for (int i = 0; i < fVerts.size(); i++)
4499  {
4500 
4501  vector<int> cEdges;
4502  getConnectedEdges(fVerts[i], zVertexData, cEdges);
4503  fVertsValence.push_back(cEdges.size());
4504 
4505  // update vertex edge pointer if ther are pointing to face edges , as they will be disabled.
4506 
4507  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
4508  {
4509  bool chk = false;
4510 
4511  for (int k = 0; k < fEdges.size(); k++)
4512  {
4513  int sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getSym()->getEdgeId();
4514 
4515  if (cEdges[j] == fEdges[k] || cEdges[j] == sEdge)
4516  {
4517  chk = true;
4518  break;
4519  }
4520  }
4521 
4522  if (!chk)
4523  {
4524  meshObj->mesh.vertices[fVerts[i]].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[j]]);
4525  break;
4526  }
4527  }
4528 
4529  }
4530 
4531  // make face edges as boundary edges, and disable them if both half edges have null face pointers.
4532  for (int i = 0; i < fEdges.size(); i++)
4533  {
4534  meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[i]].setFace(nullptr);
4535 
4536  int symEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[i]].getSym()->getEdgeId();
4537 
4538  if (onBoundary(fEdges[i], zEdgeData) && onBoundary(symEdge, zEdgeData))
4539  {
4540  deactivateElement(fEdges[i], zEdgeData);
4541  }
4542  }
4543 
4544  // get face vertices and deactivate them if all connected half edges are in active.
4545  for (int i = 0; i < fVerts.size(); i++)
4546  {
4547  bool removeVertex = true;
4548  if (fVertsValence[i] > 2) removeVertex = false;
4549 
4550 
4551  if (removeVertex)
4552  {
4553  deactivateElement(fVerts[i], zVertexData);
4554  }
4555 
4556  }
4557 
4558 
4559  // deactivate face
4560  deactivateElement(index, zFaceData);
4561 
4562 
4563  if (removeInactiveElems)
4564  {
4565  removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
4566  removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
4567  removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
4568  }
4569 
4570  }
4571 
4578  void deleteEdge( int index, bool removeInactiveElements = true);
4579 
4580  //--------------------------
4581  //---- TOPOLOGY MODIFIER METHODS
4582  //--------------------------
4583 
4591  void collapseEdge( int index, double edgeFactor = 0.5, bool removeInactiveElems = true)
4592  {
4593  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4594  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4595 
4596  int nFVerts = (onBoundary(index, zEdgeData)) ? 0 : getNumPolygonVertices( meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->getFaceId());
4597 
4598  int sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getSym()->getEdgeId();
4599  int nFVerts_Sym = (onBoundary(sEdge, zEdgeData)) ? 0 : getNumPolygonVertices( meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getFace()->getFaceId());
4600 
4601  // check if there is only 1 polygon and its a triangle. If true, cant perform collapse.
4602  if (numPolygons() == 1)
4603  {
4604  if (nFVerts == 3 || nFVerts_Sym == 3)
4605  {
4606  printf("\n Can't perform collapse on single trianglular face.");
4607  return;
4608  }
4609 
4610  }
4611 
4612  // get edge faces
4613  vector<int> eFaces;
4614  getFaces(index, zEdgeData, eFaces);
4615 
4616  if (numPolygons() == eFaces.size())
4617  {
4618  if (nFVerts == nFVerts_Sym && nFVerts_Sym == 3)
4619  {
4620  printf("\n Can't perform collapse on common edge of 2 triangular face mesh.");
4621  return;
4622  }
4623 
4624  }
4625 
4626  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4627  int v2 = meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4628 
4629  int vertexRemoveID = v1;
4630  int vertexRetainID = v2;
4631 
4632  if (getVertexValence(v1) > getVertexValence(v2))
4633  {
4634  vertexRemoveID = v2;
4635  vertexRetainID = v1;
4636 
4637  edgeFactor = 1 - edgeFactor;
4638 
4639  }
4640 
4641  // set new position of retained vertex
4642  zVector e = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRemoveID] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRetainID];
4643  double eLength = e.length();
4644  e.normalize();
4645 
4646  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRetainID] = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRetainID] + e * (edgeFactor * eLength);
4647 
4648 
4649  // get connected edges of vertexRemoveID
4650  vector<int> cEdges;
4651  getConnectedEdges(vertexRemoveID, zVertexData, cEdges);
4652 
4653 
4654  // get connected edges
4655 
4656  int vNext = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4657  vector<int> cEdgesVNext;
4658  getConnectedEdges(vNext, zVertexData, cEdgesVNext);
4659 
4660  int vPrev = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4661  vector<int> cEdgesVPrev;
4662  getConnectedEdges(vPrev, zVertexData, cEdgesVPrev);
4663 
4664  int vNext_sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4665  vector<int> cEdgesVNext_sEdge;
4666  getConnectedEdges(vNext_sEdge, zVertexData, cEdgesVNext_sEdge);
4667 
4668  int vPrev_sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4669  vector<int> cEdgesVPrev_sEdge;
4670  getConnectedEdges(vPrev_sEdge, zVertexData, cEdgesVPrev_sEdge);
4671 
4672  // current edge
4673  if (nFVerts == 3)
4674  {
4675 
4676  // update pointers
4677  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setNext(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getNext());
4678  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getPrev());
4679 
4680  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->setPrev(nullptr);
4681  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->setNext(nullptr);
4682 
4683  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->setPrev(nullptr);
4684  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->setNext(nullptr);
4685 
4686  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setFace(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace());
4687 
4688  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace())
4689  {
4690  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace()->setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext());
4691  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->setFace(nullptr);
4692  }
4693 
4694  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4695 
4696  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4697  {
4698  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVNext.size(); i++)
4699  {
4700  if (cEdgesVNext[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4701  {
4702  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVNext[i]]);
4703  }
4704  }
4705  }
4706 
4707  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4708 
4709  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() || meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == index)
4710  {
4711  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVPrev.size(); i++)
4712  {
4713  if (cEdgesVPrev[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() && cEdgesVPrev[i] != index)
4714  {
4715  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVPrev[i]]);
4716  }
4717  }
4718  }
4719 
4720  // decativate prev edge
4721  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4722 
4723  // decativate next and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4724  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getNext() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getSym())
4725  {
4726 
4727  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4728  deactivateElement(vNext, zVertexData);
4729  }
4730 
4731  // decativate prev and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4732  else if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getPrev() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getSym())
4733  {
4734  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getVertex()->getVertexId(), zVertexData);
4735  deactivateElement(vNext, zVertexData);
4736  }
4737 
4738  // deactivate face pointed by collapse edge
4739  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData);
4740 
4741  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setFace(nullptr);
4742 
4743  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setNext(nullptr);
4744  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setPrev(nullptr);
4745 
4746  }
4747  else
4748  {
4749  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to current edge
4750  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getEdgeId())
4751  {
4752  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym());
4753  }
4754 
4755  // update pointers
4756  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev());
4757 
4758  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setNext(nullptr);
4759  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setPrev(nullptr);
4760  }
4761 
4762  // symmetry edge
4763  if (nFVerts_Sym == 3)
4764  {
4765 
4766 
4767  // update pointers
4768  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setNext(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getNext());
4769  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getPrev());
4770 
4771  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->setPrev(nullptr);
4772  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->setNext(nullptr);
4773 
4774  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->setPrev(nullptr);
4775  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->setNext(nullptr);
4776 
4777  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setFace(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace());
4778 
4779  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace())
4780  {
4781  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace()->setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext());
4782  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->setFace(nullptr);
4783  }
4784 
4785  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4786 
4787  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4788  {
4789  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVNext_sEdge.size(); i++)
4790  {
4791  if (cEdgesVNext_sEdge[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4792  {
4793  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext_sEdge].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVNext_sEdge[i]]);
4794  }
4795  }
4796  }
4797 
4798  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4799 
4800  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() || meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == sEdge)
4801  {
4802  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVPrev_sEdge.size(); i++)
4803  {
4804  if (cEdgesVPrev_sEdge[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() && cEdgesVPrev_sEdge[i] != sEdge)
4805  {
4806  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVPrev_sEdge[i]]);
4807  }
4808  }
4809  }
4810 
4811  // decativate prev edge
4812  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4813 
4814  // decativate next and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4815  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getNext() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getSym())
4816  {
4817  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4818  deactivateElement(vNext_sEdge, zVertexData);
4819  }
4820 
4821  // decativate prev and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4822  else if (meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getPrev() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getSym())
4823  {
4824  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4825  deactivateElement(vNext_sEdge, zVertexData);
4826  }
4827 
4828  // deactivate face pointed by collapse edge
4829  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData);
4830 
4831  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setFace(nullptr);
4832 
4833  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setNext(nullptr);
4834  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setPrev(nullptr);
4835 
4836  }
4837  else
4838  {
4839  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to current edge
4840  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getEdgeId())
4841  {
4842  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym());
4843  }
4844 
4845  // update pointers
4846  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev());
4847 
4848  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setNext(nullptr);
4849  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setPrev(nullptr);
4850  }
4851 
4852  // update connected edges verter pointer
4853  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++)
4854  {
4855  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[cEdges[i]])
4856  {
4857  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4858  int v2 = vertexRemoveID;
4859  meshObj->mesh.removeFromVerticesEdge(v1, v2);
4860 
4861  meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getSym()->setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexRetainID]);
4862 
4863  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(v1, vertexRetainID, cEdges[i]);
4864  }
4865  }
4866 
4867 
4868  // deactivate collapse edge
4869  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index])
4870  {
4871  deactivateElement(index, zEdgeData);
4872  }
4873 
4874  // deactivate vertexRemoveID
4875  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[vertexRemoveID])
4876  {
4877  deactivateElement(vertexRemoveID, zVertexData);
4878  }
4879 
4880  // compute normals
4881  computeMeshNormals();
4882 
4883 
4884  // remove inactive elements
4885  if (removeInactiveElems)
4886  {
4887  removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
4888  removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
4889  removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
4890  }
4891 
4892  }

4902  int splitEdge(int index, double edgeFactor = 0.5, bool fTriangulate = false)
4903  {
4904  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4905  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4906 
4907  vector<int> eFaces;
4908  getFaces(index, zEdgeData, eFaces);
4909 
4910  zEdge* edgetoSplit = &meshObj->mesh.edges[index];
4911  zEdge* edgetoSplitSym = edgetoSplit->getSym();
4912 
4913  zEdge* e_next = edgetoSplit->getNext();
4914  zEdge* e_prev = edgetoSplit->getPrev();
4915 
4916  zEdge* es_next = edgetoSplitSym->getNext();
4917  zEdge* es_prev = edgetoSplitSym->getPrev();
4918 
4919 
4920  zVector edgeDir = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId()] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()];
4921  double edgeLength = edgeDir.length();
4922  edgeDir.normalize();
4923 
4924  zVector newVertPos = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()] + edgeDir * edgeFactor * edgeLength;
4925 
4926 
4927 
4928  // check if vertex exists if not add new vertex
4929  int VertId;
4930  bool vExists = vertexExists(newVertPos, VertId);
4931  if (!vExists)
4932  {
4933  meshObj->mesh.addVertex(newVertPos);
4934  VertId = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() - 1;
4935  }
4936 
4937  //printf("\n newVert: %1.2f %1.2f %1.2f %s ", newVertPos.x, newVertPos.y, newVertPos.z, (vExists)?"true":"false");
4938 
4939  if (!vExists)
4940  {
4941  // remove from verticesEdge map
4942  meshObj->mesh.removeFromVerticesEdge(edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId(), edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId());
4943 
4944  // add new edges
4945  int v1 = VertId;
4946  int v2 = edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4947  bool edgesResize = meshObj->mesh.addEdges(v1, v2);
4948 
4949  // recompute pointers if resize is true
4950  if (edgesResize)
4951  {
4952  edgetoSplit = &meshObj->mesh.edges[index];
4953  edgetoSplitSym = edgetoSplit->getSym();
4954 
4955  e_next = edgetoSplit->getNext();
4956  e_prev = edgetoSplit->getPrev();
4957 
4958  es_next = edgetoSplitSym->getNext();
4959  es_prev = edgetoSplitSym->getPrev();
4960 
4961  //printf("\n working!");
4962 
4963  }
4964 
4965  // update vertex pointers
4966  meshObj->mesh.vertices[v1].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2]);
4967  meshObj->mesh.vertices[v2].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1]);
4968 
4970  edgetoSplit->setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[VertId]); // current edge vertex pointer updated to new added vertex
4971 
4972  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1].setNext(edgetoSplitSym); // new added edge next pointer to point to the next of current edge
4973  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1].setPrev(es_prev);
4974 
4975  if (edgetoSplitSym->getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1].setFace(edgetoSplitSym->getFace());
4976 
4977  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2].setPrev(edgetoSplit);
4978  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2].setNext(e_next);
4979 
4980  if (edgetoSplit->getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2].setFace(edgetoSplit->getFace());
4981 
4982  // update verticesEdge map
4983  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId(), edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId(), edgetoSplit->getEdgeId());
4984 
4985  }
4986 
4987  if (fTriangulate)
4988  {
4989  for (int i = 0; i < eFaces.size(); i++) faceTriangulate( eFaces[i]);
4990  }
4991 
4992  return VertId;
4993  }

5009  void flipTriangleEdge(int &index)
5010  {
5011  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
5012  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
5013 
5014  zEdge* edgetoFlip = &meshObj->mesh.edges[index];
5015  zEdge* edgetoFlipSym = edgetoFlip->getSym();
5016 
5017  if (!edgetoFlip->getFace() || !edgetoFlipSym->getFace())
5018  {
5019  throw std::invalid_argument("\n Cannot flip boundary edge %i ");
5020  return;
5021  }
5022 
5023  vector<int> edgetoFlip_fVerts;
5024  getVertices(edgetoFlip->getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData, edgetoFlip_fVerts);
5025

5027  getVertices(edgetoFlipSym->getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData, edgetoFlipSym_fVerts);
5028 
5029  if (edgetoFlip_fVerts.size() != 3 || edgetoFlipSym_fVerts.size() != 3)
5030  {
5031  throw std::invalid_argument("\n Cannot flip edge not shared by two Triangles.");
5032  return;
5033  }
5034 
5035  zEdge* e_next = edgetoFlip->getNext();
5036  zEdge* e_prev = edgetoFlip->getPrev();
5037 
5038  zEdge* es_next = edgetoFlipSym->getNext();
5039  zEdge* es_prev = edgetoFlipSym->getPrev();
5040 
5041  // remove from verticesEdge map
5042  string removeHashKey = (to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
5043  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.erase(removeHashKey);
5044 
5045  string removeHashKey1 = (to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
5046  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.erase(removeHashKey1);
5047 
5048  // update pointers
5049 
5050  if (edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getEdge() == edgetoFlipSym)edgetoFlip->getVertex()->setEdge(edgetoFlipSym->getPrev()->getSym());
5051  if (edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getEdge() == edgetoFlip) edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->setEdge(edgetoFlip->getPrev()->getSym());
5052 
5053  edgetoFlip->setVertex(e_next->getVertex());
5054  edgetoFlipSym->setVertex(es_next->getVertex());
5055 
5056 
5057 
5058  edgetoFlip->setNext(e_prev);
5059  edgetoFlip->setPrev(es_next);
5060 
5061  edgetoFlipSym->setNext(es_prev);
5062  edgetoFlipSym->setPrev(e_next);
5063 
5064  e_prev->setNext(es_next);
5065  es_prev->setNext(e_next);
5066 
5067  edgetoFlip->getNext()->setFace(edgetoFlip->getFace());
5068  edgetoFlip->getPrev()->setFace(edgetoFlip->getFace());
5069 
5070  edgetoFlipSym->getNext()->setFace(edgetoFlipSym->getFace());
5071  edgetoFlipSym->getPrev()->setFace(edgetoFlipSym->getFace());
5072 
5073  edgetoFlip->getFace()->setEdge(edgetoFlip);
5074  edgetoFlipSym->getFace()->setEdge(edgetoFlipSym);
5075 
5076  // update verticesEdge map
5077 
5078  string hashKey = (to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
5079  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge[hashKey] = edgetoFlipSym->getEdgeId();
5080 
5081  string hashKey1 = (to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
5082  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge[hashKey1] = edgetoFlip->getEdgeId();
5083  }

5092  void splitFaces(vector<int> &edgeList, vector<double> &edgeFactor)
5093  {
5094  if (edgeFactor.size() > 0)
5095  {
5096  if (edgeList.size() != edgeFactor.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: size of edgelist and edge factor dont match.");
5097  }
5098 
5099  int numOriginalVertices = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
5100  int numOriginalEdges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
5101  int numOriginalFaces = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
5102 
5103  for (int i = 0; i < edgeList.size(); i++)
5104  {
5105  if (edgeFactor.size() > 0) splitEdge( edgeList[i], edgeFactor[i]);
5106  else splitEdge( edgeList[i]);
5107  }
5108 
5109  for (int j = 0; j < edgeList.size(); j++)
5110  {
5111  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
5112  {
5113  zEdge *start = (i == 0) ? &meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeList[j]] : meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeList[j]].getSym();
5114 
5115  zEdge *e = start;
5116 
5117  if (!start->getFace()) continue;
5118 
5119  bool exit = false;
5120 
5121  int v1 = start->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5122  int v2 = start->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5123 
5124  do
5125  {
5126  if (e->getNext())
5127  {
5128  e = e->getNext();
5129  if (e->getVertex()->getVertexId() > numOriginalVertices)
5130  {
5131  v2 = e->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5132  exit = true;
5133  }
5134  }
5135  else exit = true;
5136 
5137  } while (e != start && !exit);
5138 
5139  // add new edges and face
5140  if (v1 == v2) continue;
5141 
5142  // check if edge exists continue loop.
5143  int outEdgeId;
5144  bool eExists = meshObj->mesh.edgeExists(v1, v2, outEdgeId);
5145 
5146  if (eExists) continue;
5147 
5148  int startEdgeId = start->getEdgeId();
5149  int e_EdgeId = e->getEdgeId();
5150 
5151  bool resizeEdges = meshObj->mesh.addEdges(v1, v2);
5152 
5153  if (resizeEdges)
5154  {
5155  start = &meshObj->mesh.edges[startEdgeId];
5156  e = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e_EdgeId];
5157  }
5158 
5159  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(); // empty polygon
5160 
5161  // update pointers
5162  zEdge *start_next = start->getNext();
5163  zEdge *e_next = e->getNext();
5164 
5165  start->setNext(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 2]);
5166  e_next->setPrev(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 2]);
5167 
5168  start_next->setPrev(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 1]);
5169  e->setNext(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 1]);
5170 
5171  meshObj->mesh.faces[numPolygons() - 1].setEdge(start_next);
5172 
5173  // edge face pointers to new face
5174  zEdge *newFace_E = start_next;
5175 
5176  do
5177  {
5178  newFace_E->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[numPolygons() - 1]);
5179 
5180  if (newFace_E->getNext()) newFace_E = newFace_E->getNext();
5181  else exit = true;
5182 
5183  } while (newFace_E != start_next && !exit);
5184 
5185  }
5186 
5187  }
5188 
5189 
5190  }

5197  void subdivideMesh(int numDivisions)
5198  {

5203

5206

5208  {
5209  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i]) splitEdge( i);
5210  }

5230
