5286  void smoothMesh( int numDivisions = 1, bool smoothCorner = false)
5287  {
5288  for (int j = 0; j < numDivisions; j++)
5289  {
5290 
5291 
5292  // get face centers
5293  vector<zVector> fCenters;
5294  getCenters( zFaceData, fCenters);
5295 
5296  // get edge centers
5297  vector<zVector> tempECenters;
5298  vector<zVector> eCenters;
5299  getCenters( zEdgeData, eCenters);
5300 
5301  tempECenters = eCenters;
5302 
5303  // compute new smooth positions of the edge centers
5304  for (int i = 0; i < eCenters.size(); i += 2)
5305  {
5306 
5307  zVector newPos;
5308 
5309  if (onBoundary(i, zEdgeData) || onBoundary(i + 1, zEdgeData)) continue;
5310 
5311  int eId = i;
5312 
5313  vector<int> eVerts;
5314  getVertices(i, zEdgeData, eVerts);
5315  for (int j = 0; j < eVerts.size(); j++) newPos += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[eVerts[j]];
5316 
5317 
5318  vector<int> eFaces;
5319  getFaces(i, zEdgeData, eFaces);
5320  for (int j = 0; j < eFaces.size(); j++) newPos += fCenters[eFaces[j]];
5321 
5322  newPos /= (eFaces.size() + eVerts.size());
5323 
5324  eCenters[i] = newPos;
5325  eCenters[i + 1] = newPos;
5326 
5327  }
5328 
5329  // compute new smooth positions for the original vertices
5330  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
5331  {
5332  if (onBoundary(i, zVertexData))
5333  {
5334  vector<int> cEdges;
5335  getConnectedEdges(i, zVertexData, cEdges);
5336 
5337  if (!smoothCorner && cEdges.size() == 2) continue;
5338 
5339  zVector P = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i];
5340  int n = 1;
5341 
5342  zVector R;
5343  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
5344  {
5345  int symEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[j]].getSym()->getEdgeId();
5346 
5347  if (onBoundary(cEdges[j], zEdgeData) || onBoundary(symEdge, zEdgeData))
5348  {
5349  R += tempECenters[cEdges[j]];
5350  n++;
5351  }
5352  }
5353 
5354  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] = (P + R) / n;
5355 
5356  }
5357  else
5358  {
5359  zVector R;
5360  vector<int> cEdges;
5361  getConnectedEdges(i, zVertexData, cEdges);
5362  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++) R += tempECenters[cEdges[j]];
5363  R /= cEdges.size();
5364 
5365  zVector F;
5366  vector<int> cFaces;
5367  getConnectedFaces(i, zVertexData, cFaces);
5368  for (int j = 0; j < cFaces.size(); j++) F += fCenters[cFaces[j]];
5369  F /= cFaces.size();
5370 
5371  zVector P = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i];
5372  int n = cFaces.size();
5373 
5374  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] = (F + (R * 2) + (P * (n - 3))) / n;
5375  }
5376 
5377 
5378  }
5379 
5380 
5381  int numOriginalVertices = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
5382 
5383  // split edges at center
5384  int numOriginaledges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
5385 
5386  for (int i = 0; i < numOriginaledges; i += 2)
5387  {
5388  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
5389  {
5390  int newVert = splitEdge( i);
5391 
5392  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[newVert] = eCenters[i];
5393  }
5394  }
5395 
5396 
5397 
5398  // add faces
5399  int numOriginalfaces = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
5400 
5401  for (int i = 0; i < numOriginalfaces; i++)
5402  {
5403  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i]) continue;
5404 
5405  vector<int> fEdges;
5406  getEdges(i, zFaceData, fEdges);
5407 
5408  vector<int> fVerts;
5409  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
5410 
5411 
5413 
5414  meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i] = false;
5415 
5416  int numCurrentEdges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();;
5417 
5418  // check if vertex exists if not add new vertex
5419  int VertId;
5420  bool vExists = vertexExists(fCenters[i], VertId);
5421  if (!vExists)
5422  {
5423  meshObj->mesh.addVertex(fCenters[i]);
5424  VertId = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() - 1;
5425  }
5426 
5427 
5428  // add new faces
5429  int startId = 0;
5430  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[0]].getVertex()->getVertexId() < numOriginalVertices) startId = 1;
5431 
5432  for (int k = startId; k < fEdges.size() + startId; k += 2)
5433  {
5434  vector<int> newFVerts;
5435 
5436  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getVertex()->getVertexId();
5437  newFVerts.push_back(v1);
5438 
5439  int v2 = VertId; // face center
5440  newFVerts.push_back(v2);
5441 
5442  int v3 = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getPrev()->getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5443  newFVerts.push_back(v3);
5444 
5445  int v4 = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getPrev()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5446  newFVerts.push_back(v4);
5447 
5448  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(newFVerts);
5449 
5450 
5451  }
5452 
5453 
5454 
5455  }
5456 
5457 
5458  //printMesh(inMesh);
5459 
5460  computeMeshNormals();
5461 
5462  }
5463 
5464 
5465 
5466 
5467  }
5468 
5476  zObjMesh extrudeMesh(float extrudeThickness, bool thicknessTris = false)
5477  {
5478  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() == 0 || meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) computeMeshNormals();
5479 
5480  zObjMesh out;
5481 
5482  vector<zVector> positions;
5483  vector<int> polyCounts;
5484  vector<int> polyConnects;
5485 
5486 
5487 
5488  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
5489  {
5490  positions.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i]);
5491  }
5492 
5493  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
5494  {
5495  positions.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] + (meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i] * extrudeThickness));
5496  }
5497 
5498  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
5499  {
5500  vector<int> fVerts;
5501  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
5502 
5503  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
5504  {
5505  polyConnects.push_back(fVerts[j]);
5506  }
5507 
5508  polyCounts.push_back(fVerts.size());
5509 
5510  for (int j = fVerts.size() - 1; j >= 0; j--)
5511  {
5512  polyConnects.push_back(fVerts[j] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5513  }
5514 
5515  polyCounts.push_back(fVerts.size());
5516 
5517  }
5518 
5519 
5520  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i++)
5521  {
5522  if (onBoundary(i, zEdgeData))
5523  {
5524  vector<int> eVerts;
5525  getVertices(i, zEdgeData, eVerts);
5526 
5527  if (thicknessTris)
5528  {
5529  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1]);
5530  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0]);
5531  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5532 
5533  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5534  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5535  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1]);
5536 
5537  polyCounts.push_back(3);
5538  polyCounts.push_back(3);
5539  }
5540  else
5541  {
5542  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1]);
5543  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0]);
5544  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5545  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5546 
5547 
5548  polyCounts.push_back(4);
5549  }
5550 
5551 
5552  }
5553  }
5554 
5555  out.mesh = zMesh(positions, polyCounts, polyConnects);
5556 
5557  return out;
5558  }

5569  void offsetMeshFace(int faceIndex, double offset, vector<zVector>& offsetPositions)
5570  {
5571  vector<zVector> out;
5572 
5573  vector<int> fVerts;
5574  getVertices(faceIndex, zFaceData, fVerts);
5575 
5576  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
5577  {
5578  int next = (j + 1) % fVerts.size();
5579  int prev = (j - 1 + fVerts.size()) % fVerts.size();
5580 
5581 
5582  zVector Ori = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];;
5583  zVector v1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[prev]] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
5584  v1.normalize();
5585 
5586  zVector v2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[next]] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
5587  v2.normalize();
5588 
5589  zVector v3 = v1;
5590 
5591  v1 = v1 ^ v2;
5592  v3 = v3 + v2;
5593 
5594  double cs = v3 * v2;
5595 
5596  zVector a1 = v2 * cs;
5597  zVector a2 = v3 - a1;
5598 
5599  double alpha = sqrt(a2.length() * a2.length());
5600  if (cs < 0) alpha *= -1;
5601 
5602  double length = offset / alpha;
5603 
5604  zVector mPos = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
5605  zVector offPos = mPos + (v3 * length);
5606 
5607  out.push_back(offPos);
5608 
5609  }
5610 
5611  offsetPositions = out;
5612 
5613  }
5614 
5625  void offsetMeshFace_Variable( int faceIndex, vector<double>& offsets, zVector& faceCenter, zVector& faceNormal, vector<zVector>& intersectionPositions)
5626  {
5627  vector<zVector> offsetPoints;
5628  vector<int> fEdges;
5629  getEdges(faceIndex, zFaceData, fEdges);
5630 
5631  for (int j = 0; j < fEdges.size(); j++)
5632  {
5633  zVector p2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[j]].getVertex()->getVertexId()];
5634  zVector p1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[j]].getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId()];
5635 
5636  zVector norm1 = ((p1 - p2) ^ faceNormal);
5637  norm1.normalize();
5638  if ((faceCenter - p1) * norm1 < 0) norm1 *= -1;
5639 
5640 
5641  offsetPoints.push_back(p1 + norm1 * offsets[j]);
5642  offsetPoints.push_back(p2 + norm1 * offsets[j]);
5643 
5644  }
5645 
5646 
5647  for (int j = 0; j < fEdges.size(); j++)
5648  {
5649  int prevId = (j - 1 + fEdges.size()) % fEdges.size();
5650 
5651  zVector a0 = offsetPoints[j * 2];
5652  zVector a1 = offsetPoints[j * 2 + 1];
5653 
5654  zVector b0 = offsetPoints[prevId * 2];
5655  zVector b1 = offsetPoints[prevId * 2 + 1];
5656 
5657 
5658 
5659  double uA = -1;
5660  double uB = -1;
5661  bool intersect = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.line_lineClosestPoints(a0, a1, b0, b1, uA, uB);
5662 
5663  if (intersect)
5664  {
5665  //printf("\n %i working!! ", j);
5666 
5667  zVector closestPt;
5668 
5669  if (uA >= uB)
5670  {
5671  zVector dir = a1 - a0;
5672  double len = dir.length();
5673  dir.normalize();
5674 
5675  if (uA < 0) dir *= -1;
5676  closestPt = a0 + dir * len * uA;
5677  }
5678  else
5679  {
5680  zVector dir = b1 - b0;
5681  double len = dir.length();
5682  dir.normalize();
5683 
5684  if (uB < 0) dir *= -1;
5685 
5686  closestPt = b0 + dir * len * uB;
5687  }
5688 
5689 
5690  intersectionPositions.push_back(closestPt);
5691  }
5692 
5693  }
5694  }
5695 
5696 
5697 
5698  };
5699 
5700 
5701 
5702 }
